data.title: The Palm Restaurant
data.meta_description: The Palm Restaurant is located in the Hard Rock Hotel at Universal Studios Orlando. Featuring prime aged steak & seafood dishes. Reservations | Menu
data.text:
Hours & Location

Orlando, FL 32819

(407) 503-7256

Additional Information

Located in the magical city of Orlando, The Palm is a culinary gem of Central Florida. This unique dining destination is just moments away from Universal Studios and the Orlando International Premium Outlets, making this the perfect location for any occasion.

Whatever Your Mood

Whether youâ€™re looking for a relaxing cocktail at our beautiful bar, craving a generous steak with the perfect glass of wine, or planning a special party for an upcoming milestone, we have all this and more waiting for you at The Palm.

Learn Our Story

Catering

Planning your next event has never been so easy, or delicious! The Palm now offers online ordering for all of your event catering needs! Placing an order is just a few clicks away. Build your order, checkout and let us take care of the rest!
